messages.subject: [unschoolingbasics] Re: what is unschooling?
messages.msgSnippet: ... Of course I do! We all have a very real interest in the word and what it means, whether we think of what we re doing as homeschooling or not. Helen
messages.messageBody:
At 10:29 AM -0600 6/1/04, Buck and Brisco Jones wrote:
>***I would add that this is only one man's opinion, and while I respect
>his right to voice it, I would add that my friend Billy also has a
>vested interest in the word 'unschooling.'***
>
>Some would say you have a vested interest in the word "homeschooling."

Of course I do!

We all have a very real interest in the word and what it means,
whether we think of what we're doing as homeschooling or not.

Helen

messages.subject: Re: what is unschooling?
messages.msgSnippet: ***I would add that this is only one man s opinion, and while I respect his right to voice it, I would add that my friend Billy also has a vested interest in
messages.messageBody:
***I would add that this is only one man's opinion, and while I respect
his right to voice it, I would add that my friend Billy also has a
vested interest in the word 'unschooling.'***

Some would say you have a vested interest in the word "homeschooling."

Deb Lewis
